dynamic-hibernate.query: SELECT queue_Nm, exchanger_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE_EXCHANGER WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($exchanger_Id) AND exchanger_Id = :exchanger_Id #end ORDER BY exchanger_Id DESC

SELECT qe.queue_Nm, e.exchanger_Id, e.name, e.ip, e.port, e.url, e.type, e.check_Port, e.system_Status, e.manual_Status FROM CSL_EXCHANGER e, CSL_QUEUE_EXCHANGER qe WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND qe.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($name) AND e.name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND e.ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND e.port = :port #end #if($type) AND type = :type #end #if($check_Port) AND e.check_Port = :check_Port #end #if($system_Status) AND e.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND e.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND qe.exchanger_Id = e.exchanger_Id ORDER BY e.exchanger_Id DESC

SELECT e.exchanger_Id, e.name, e.ip, e.port, e.url, e.type, e.check_Port, e.system_Status, e.manual_Status FROM CSL_EXCHANGER e WHERE 1=1 #if($name) AND e.name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND e.ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND e.port = :port #end #if($type) AND type = :type #end #if($check_Port) AND e.check_Port = :check_Port #end #if($system_Status) AND e.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND e.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND e.exchanger_Id NOT IN (SELECT qe.exchanger_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE_EXCHANGER qe WHERE qe.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm) ORDER BY e.exchanger_Id DESC

SELECT q.queue_Nm, q.is_Repeat, q.expire_Time, q.is_Trace, q.manual_Status, qe.exchanger_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE q, CSL_QUEUE_EXCHANGER qe WHERE 1=1 #if($exchanger_Id) AND qe.exchanger_Id = :exchanger_Id #end #if($manual_Status) AND q.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND q.queue_Nm = qe.queue_Nm

SELECT q.queue_Nm, q.is_Repeat, q.expire_Time, q.is_Trace, q.manual_Status, qe.exchanger_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE q, CSL_QUEUE_EXCHANGER qe WHERE 1=1 #if($exchanger_Id) AND qe.exchanger_Id = :exchanger_Id #end #if($queue_Nm) AND q.queue_Nm LIKE :queue_Nm #end #if($manual_Status) AND q.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND q.queue_Nm = qe.queue_Nm

SELECT e.exchanger_Id, e.name, e.ip, e.port, e.url, e.type, e.system_Status, e.manual_Status, qe.queue_Nm FROM CSL_EXCHANGER e, CSL_QUEUE_EXCHANGER qe WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND qe.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($system_Status) AND e.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND e.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND e.exchanger_Id = qe.exchanger_Id
